channel.title: SCNZ - Jason Scanzoni | Startup Engineer and Product Manager | Technical, Entrepreneurial, Creative, Analytical
channel.description: Jason Scanzoni is a product manager and startup engineer based out of Washington, DC.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Cherry Picker is a sales and marketing tool which prioritize and generate a predictable stream of leads. Developed as an internal tool to generate leads for OpenWater, but the tool had the capability to generate leads for other markets.
